content: DX 351 M&E Powder-actuated tool Fully automatic, high-productivity, compact powder actuated tool for mechanical and electrical fastenings ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features High productivity – fully automatic piston return and cartridge transport Very user-friendly – light, low recoil, low noise Pole tool available for overhead applications Adjustable power regulation for optimal control of fastener settings Quick and easy conversion from fastening single to collated nails Applications Fastening various items such as cable conduits and cable ties to steel and concrete in electrical installation work Fastening conduits and electrical junction boxes Fastening of data and electrical cable installations Overhead suspended installations of EMTs, power and data cabling Installing threaded studs to concrete or steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 15.9 x 2.2 x 6.5 in Weight: 4.9 lb. Fastener length range: 0.47 - 1.85 in Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 15.9 x 2.2 x 6.5 in | Weight | 4.9 lb | Fastener Intake | Single | Fastener length range | 0.47 - 1.85 in | Cartridge type | .27 caliber short, 6.8/11 M10 | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | No | Hilti Connect | Yes | Power (max.) | 245 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-P8S-351 ### ITEMS- 3591502 -
